Entries.reject_534: %You get the sense that you're looking in the right direction - but this isn't the right person to give this to. You pocket the ring.
Oh no, don't go giving that to me! A woman may have died wearing that thing.$2#$b#And no matter how pretty it is, I ain't wearing a dead woman's ring. That's bad juju.
